# entity

**Instance Property**

The entity the receiver is associated with

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var entity: (any HasCollision)? { get set }
```

## Using the recognizer

- **canPrevent(_:)**
- **touchesBegan(_:with:)**: Sent to the gesture recognizer when one or more fingers touch down on the associated entity.
